title: Describe shape of histogram of time to finish game

content.question: The histogram above shows the number of minutes needed by 45 students to finish playing a computer game. Which of the following statements is correct?

choices.label: The distribution is skewed to the right.
The distribution is skewed to the left.
The distribution appears to be normal.
The distribution appears to be chi-square.
The distribution appears to be uniform.

content.answer: The distribution is skewed to the left.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
